Hello,

you reached my coding overview. Before you dive into the projects, let me explain what programming means to me and why I spend so much time with it. Using Processing I learnd that the computers we use have more power I could even imagine and all the repetitive tasks could be done by the machine. With this kind of "lazieness" in mind I started automating InDesign layouts and developing tools for After Effects. I'm not a "programmer". I"m an autodidact that comes from the design and I want to keep it that way. But enough of that chit chat.
See my favorite programming projects below.

Geographic Visualization

While studying at the FH Potsdam I took interest in plotting data onto interactive maps. For a project in the field of "Design of Software Interfaces" Felix Lange, Sabine Richter, Peter Sekan and I developed a concept and wrote a mockup for a desaster management software on the maeve table. This was the starting point for understanding maps and location data. Based on this knowledge I developed Locations.jsx and AEMap.jsx for Adobe After Effects that allow the creation of location based data and developed with Peter Sekan UE L채rm. That started as a geographic project but became a a data visualization.

Locations
AEMap
Tangible Maps
UE L채rm

Programming Typography

During my studies I became a member of the group Grenzfarben. Together with Ina Dautier, Antje St체rholz, Tanja Sannewald, Sebastian Matth채us, Steven Nikolic, Oliver Otto, Peter Sekan and I produced, since 2008, several product catalouges for JustMusic and Sound Service. We started out working in Quark Express and had to format every paragraph of these catalouges, that have more than 300 pages and 5000 to 7000 products, by hand. When we made the switch to InDesign I was tired of clicking. So I tried to automate the process with JavaScript/ExtendScript. It worked. Now we have a semiautomatic process that gives us more time for design and I never stoped writing scripts. Below you will find Swissd.jsx and Monoline Text.jsx for After Effects together with a workshop I gave at the FHPotsdam about Typography and Automation and a semiautomatic process that imports my project data from Incom.org into a Layout.

Swissd
Monoline text
Typography and Automation
Incom.org 2 Layout
